//instructions using LW and SW- You may have to inserted NOPs to get the required result
00000000 00000000
00000001 1C010001 //LW $1, 1($0) // LOAD
00000002 1C020002 //LW $2, 2($0)
00000003 1C030003 //LW $3, 3($0)
00000004 1C040004 //LW $4, 4($0)
00000005 14222800 //MUL $5,$1,$2 // MUL
00000006 00000000 //NOP
00000007 00643000 //ADD $6,$3,$4 // ADD
00000008 00000000 //NOP
00000009 00000000 //NOP
0000000A 0CA63800 //XOR $7,$5,$6 // XOR
0000000B 00000000 //NOP
0000000C 00000000 //NOP
0000000D 20070005 //SW $7, 5($0) // SW
